FuncDef: This command specifies an ISID or a Range of ISIDs in a B-VPLS. One range is allowed per entry.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the ISID value in 24 bits. When singular, ISID identifies a particular ISID to be used for matching. Values-0 to 16777215.
Identifies upper value in a range of ISIDs to be used as matching criteria.
